docs.lead_paragraph: EVERYONE who was connected in any way with the parent education or child development fields during the years of World War II will remember the impact of that upheaval on youngsters all over the world.

headline.main: The Big Moment When Dad Returns

docs.abstract: D Barclay on relationship with father returned from war duty; notes Stanford Univ-sponsored survey by Dr Stolz and 10 collaborators
